project.name: OrganicMart
project.problem: Organic food has limited distribution; consumers struggle to find it, producers lack sales channels

functional_requirements.name: Product Catalog
functional_requirements.description: Category-based product listing with search and filtering (origin, certification, price range)
user_stories: As a buyer, I want to filter products by origin and organic certification
acceptance_criteria: Products displayed by category (vegetables, fruits, processed goods, beverages)
Keyword search covers product name and description
Filtering by price range, origin, and certification marks

functional_requirements.name: Cart & Purchase Flow
functional_requirements.description: Add to cart, quantity changes, coupon application, delivery date/time selection, purchase confirmation
user_stories: As a buyer, I want to purchase products from multiple producers in one order
acceptance_criteria: Add/remove products and change quantities in cart
Specify delivery address and delivery date/time
Order confirmation email sent after purchase

functional_requirements.name: User Registration & Login
functional_requirements.description: Email registration, login, password reset. Social login support.
user_stories: As a buyer, I want to create an account to manage order history and favorites
acceptance_criteria: Register and login with email + password

functional_requirements.name: Producer Dashboard
functional_requirements.description: Producer management screen for product registration, inventory management, and sales tracking
user_stories: As a producer, I want to register my products and track order status
acceptance_criteria: Register and edit product info (name, price, description, images)
View order list and sales summary

functional_requirements.name: Payment Integration
functional_requirements.description: Credit card payment (via Stripe), convenience store payment
acceptance_criteria: Support convenience store payment (7-Eleven, Lawson, FamilyMart)
Display appropriate error messages on payment failure

items.description: Product listing page loads within 2 seconds, search response within 500ms
Payment via Stripe (PCI DSS compliant), DB encryption, SSL/TLS, JWT auth

unresolved_issues.description: Delivery provider not selected (Yamato / Sagawa / Japan Post)
Coupon and points system details undecided
